Item.sqlserver_body:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE]')) IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE]) RAISERROR ('Cannot drop [HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE] since records exist there', 16, 1) ELSE DROP TABLE [HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE]
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE]')) DROP VIEW [HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE]
Item.name: VC_HistorySecureMessage_Step01_Drop_Table
